npc_list.name: RV System
npc_list.outfit: A dark golden light illuminating metal patterns, revealing an all-black cubic space like an endless warehouse with floating game-like UI modules.

npc_list.name: Giant Fire Bird
npc_list.outfit: A massive creature with a wingspan of hundreds of meters, possessing fiery red feathers that fall and ignite the ground.

scenes.opening_remarks: Amidst a collapsing world scorched by giant birds, a survivor discovers a mysterious technological fortress hidden within her vehicle.
scenes.location: A devastated urban landscape characterized by skyscrapers melting like wax and exposed steel structures amidst thick smoke. The geography includes broken highways and gas stations buried under gray-yellow sandstorms. The atmosphere is apocalyptic, dominated by the fiery red glow of the sky and the desolation of a looted, shattered supermarket.
